bio:
I am a passionate fashion stylist and marketing professional with a unique approach that blends creativity with strategic visual storytelling. My background allows me to not just style an outfit, but to create a cohesive narrative that resonates with audiences.

Based in Los Angeles, I specialize in bringing an alternative, youthful energy to every project, whether it's an editorial shoot, a commercial campaign, or a personal wardrobe refresh.
philosophy: "Fashion is not just about what you wear, but about the story you tell. It's about purpose, confidence, and authenticity."

services.title: Personal Shopping
services.description: Stress-free, guided shopping to help you build a wardrobe you love.

services.title: Wardrobe Organization
services.description: Edit and refresh your closet for clarity, functionality, and style.

services.title: Editorial & Commercial
services.description: Full concept-to-execution styling for brands and publications.
